events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it doesn't fit me at all and I would like to request a refund immediately.
The customer's concern has been categorized as a refund request due to product size issues.
Customer support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle this refund case for the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund for your recent order.
Could you please provide your order number and some photos of the jacket to start the refund process?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached photos of the jacket showing the fit issues.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund within 5 business days and send you a confirmation email soon.
Thanks for your quick response. That sounds great, I appreciate your help in resolving this.
The refund has been processed and you should see the amount reflected in your account within a few days.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund and are satisfied with how your case was handled.
We are closing this case now. Please reach out anytime if you need further assistance.
